entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
